item.title: In case you were wondering about how I maintain my youthful figure. #420

I thought it was all of the flan and chocolate croissants! :D

Paul Fernandez - 2013-07-16T00:49:55Z

I thought it was all of the flan and chocolate croissants! :D

item.title: The best flan ever.
item.description:
Location: Mercado Address: 1416 4th St

The best flan ever.

Mercado Address: 1416 4th St

Shared with: Public, James Hartshorn

+1’d by: Dawn Anderson, Paul Fernandez

Comments

Paul Fernandez - 2013-05-15T18:14:21Z

I will not submit to your opinion without trying some myself!

Christopher Hicks - 2013-05-15T18:29:12Z

If you do that in the next few weeks i’ll join you!

Christopher Hicks - 2013-05-16T12:00:40Z

I walked past there on the way to FedEx last night.  I almost got more flan, but I showed restraint.  Screw restraint.
